game.name: Syrian Warfare

reviewHighlights.text: my Eye Doctor in Moscow said he loves this game
Don't get me wrong this is a pro-Russia and Pro-Bashaar propaganda game. Majority of its fanbase are Russians that make pro-Russian mods about the war...
